docs.snippet: A pilot whose small plane crashed into an unoccupied house near Denver on Monday got out of his shattered aircraft and tried to put out the fire with a garden hose before he was forced away by burning fuel, authorities said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A pilot whose small plane crashed into an unoccupied house near Denver on Monday got out of his shattered aircraft and tried to put out the fire with a garden hose before he was forced away by burning fuel, authorities said.

headline.main: Small Plane Crashes Into House North of Denver

docs.snippet: Professor Becker, the 1992 Nobel winner in economics, was original and provocative in research on marriage, crime, addiction and racial discrimination....
docs.lead_paragraph: Professor Becker, the 1992 Nobel winner in economics, was original and provocative in research on marriage, crime, addiction and racial discrimination.
docs.abstract: Gary S Becker, who won Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Science in 1992, dies at age 83; his research illuminated motivations about such aspects of everyday life as marriage, crime, addiction, racial discrimination and birthrates.

headline.main: Gary Becker, 83, Nobel Laureate, Dies; Applied Economics to Everyday Life
headline.print_headline: Gary S. Becker, 83, Nobel Winner Who Applied Economics to Everyday Life

docs.snippet: For Rand Paul, the would-be presidential candidate, and Rupert Murdoch, one of the most powerful Republican brokers, Saturday marked a potential turn in the 2016 campaign....
docs.lead_paragraph: For Rand Paul, the would-be presidential candidate, and Rupert Murdoch, one of the most powerful Republican brokers, Saturday marked a potential turn in the 2016 campaign.
docs.abstract: Kentucky Sen Rand Paul attends Kentucky Derby with guest Rupert Murdoch, media titan who is arguably most powerful broker in Republican politics; meeting marks what could be major turn in Paul's bid for presidency in 2016, as establishment conservatives indicate their interest in a libertarian candidate who made his name by upsetting the establishment.

headline.main: At Derby Day With Murdoch, Rand Paul Goes Through His Paces
headline.print_headline: At Derby Day With Murdoch, Paul Goes Through His Paces
